name: The Iconic House on Redwood Hill
name_original: The Iconic House on Redwood Hill
description:
Welcome to the Iconic House on Redwood Hill! Story Core:

The Iconic House centers around Jordan Arroyo, a Non-Binary Queer individual, their chosen family, and the safe space that let them. The story focuses on Jordan's decision to either stay with the people that mean the most to them or move to the other side of the country for an opportunity they've been working towards. Explore the house, remember the good times and the bad, and help Jordan make their decision for the next chapter of their lives.

 

Controls

Movement

  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • Shift to sprint.
  • Control to toggle crouch.

Actions

  • Left Click to interact with objects.
  • Right Click to play dialogue about objects.
  • Tab to open/close the questbook.
  • Escape to pause/quit.
  • F11 to toggle fullscreen.
